materials.raw_text: O: 18 g, P: 6 g, Pb: 1 g, Sn: 1 g

sourcing.instructions: O: Obtain oxygen from an oxygen tank or pressurized oxygen source. P: Purchase phosphorus from a chemical supplier. Pb: Get lead from a metal supply store. Sn: Acquire tin from a metal supply store.
steps: O: Obtain oxygen from an oxygen tank or pressurized oxygen source. P: Purchase phosphorus from a chemical supplier. Pb: Get lead from a metal supply store. Sn: Acquire tin from a metal supply store.

1. Weigh each ingredient precisely using a digital scale. 2. In a clean glass container, add 18 g of oxygen. 3. Slowly add 6 g of phosphorus while stirring continuously. 4. Add 1 g of lead, ensuring all materials are mixed thoroughly. 5. Finally, incorporate 1 g of tin and mix until homogeneous.
